segments.text: Ugh, the sink is spilling water everywhere, what a filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinet doors and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's oblivious, her foot right in that dirty puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate while ignoring the flood— ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's greasy from their hands, tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's pawing into the cookie jar like an animal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies probably falling everywhere now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just begging for her share, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water and potential falls— this kitchen's turning gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the open window can't air out this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how sloppy and hazardous it all looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is the only clean part in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR
